text: I hope you all had some great Holidays with family and friends! These past 2 weeks were really pleasant and I took quite some time off to be lazy and play video games. Oh and as always, I ate too much. I have not played this game yet, but I will just for its soundtrack alone as it's one of my favorites of the year. At this point, I'm not sure if being associated to a bad movie hurt its sales or if it actually helped, because of how out of left field this is. Looking at reviews, it seems to be a pretty solid metroidvania.
author: SupraDarky

text: It has no right being as good as it is. Then again, WayForward are the people behind so this being good is to be expected.

text: It has no inherent meaning, but I believe it's use was to define its regression of today's 3D graphics to 2D pixel graphics.  It's a great looking game and I am not belittling its aesthetic. I just believe it was used to describe itself.
